Nana Obiri - Yeboah (amụrụ na Maachị 28, 1983) bụ onye nduzi ihe nkiri Ghana. A maara ya maka ihe nkiri afọ 2015 The Cursed Ones, nke nwetara nhọpụta ịrị na atọ na Africa Movie Academy Awards, nke gụnyere Best Film na Best Director.
A mụrụ Nana Obiri - Yeboah na Maachị 28, 1979, na Accra, Ghana
O dere ma duzie egwuregwu mbụ ya mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na anọ na chọọchị ya.
